nodes.text: Pangalactus was a restaurant on Coruscant whose air was rich with exotic spices. Every dining room within was equipped with floor-to-ceiling monitors that could display total-immersion visuals from a vast library of images, including vistas of Alderaan and recreations of famous moments in the history of the Galactic Empire. The restaurant served a wide variety of meals, including Corellian, Hapan, and Mon Calamari-style cuisine.

Head of State of the Galactic Empire Jagged Fel dined with his fiancée Jaina Solo and Solo's family, Han, Leia and Allana Solo in 43 ABY at a dinner that was overseen by several members of Fel's security detail and the droids C-3PO and R2-D2. The dinner was quickly interrupted by an assassination attempt on Fel by Kester Tolann, and one on the Solos by two YVH-Series battle droids. The occupants of the private room quickly halted the assassins, who were, unbeknownst to their targets, working for the Imperial Moff Drikl Lecersen and the Kuati Senator Haydnat Treen.
